title: Opa Gatekeeper: How To Write Policies For Kubernetes Clusters
description: Learn how to leverage OPA Gatekeeper to write and enforce policies in Kubernetes clusters, ensuring security and efficient resource management in your environment.
cntitle: Opa Gatekeeper：如何为 Kubernetes 集群编写策略
cndescription: 了解如何利用 OPA Gatekeeper 在 Kubernetes 集群中编写和执行策略，确保环境的安全性和高效资源管理。
